message.content:
Subject: Resignation from [Company Name] - Your Employee

Dear [Boss's Name],

I hope this email finds you well. After careful consideration and thoughtful deliberation, I have decided to resign from my position at [Company Name]. My last day will be [resignation date].

I truly appreciate the opportunities that [Company Name] has given me, and I am grateful for the support and mentorship of [Boss's Name] throughout my tenure. While this decision was not taken lightly, it is aligned with my personal goals and aspirations.

During my notice period, I will work diligently to ensure a smooth transition of responsibilities to my colleagues and will be available for any assistance needed in the coming weeks. Please let me know if there are any projects or tasks that need to be prioritized before my departure. Additionally, I would like to request a meeting with you in the next few days to discuss the details of this transition further.

Once again, thank you for your guidance and support during my time at [Company Name]. I am confident that our team will continue to achieve great success and make meaningful contributions in the future.

Sincerely,

[Your Full Name]
[Your Current Position]
[Date of Resignation]
